hero.title: Manage your ISP from one place. Bill better, operate faster.
hero.description: PayNetLink automates customer management, payments, MikroTik network, and communications for your internet provider. Fewer manual errors, more control.
hero.ctaNote: No credit card required · Setup in 10 minutes · Support included

features.title: Everything your ISP needs in one platform
features.description: From customer registration to automated billing, PayNetLink covers every stage of your operation.

clients.title: Customer Management
clients.description: Register customers, contracts, and plans in seconds. View complete payment and service history in one place.

payments.title: Recurring Payments
payments.description: Automate monthly billing with cards or bank accounts. Reduce delinquency with automatic reminders.

network.title: Network Automation
network.description: Direct integration with MikroTik. Suspend or activate services based on payment status without manual intervention.

notifications.title: Automatic Notifications
notifications.description: Send payment reminders, confirmations, and alerts via SMS, email, or WhatsApp with no extra effort.

invoicing.title: Electronic Invoicing
invoicing.description: Generate fiscally valid electronic invoices. Comply with local regulations without complications.

analytics.title: Reports & Analytics
analytics.description: Visualize key business metrics. Identify trends and make decisions based on real data.

clientControl.title: Full control of your customers
clientControl.description: View each customer's status in real time. Filter by plan, payment status, location, and more. Export lists for analysis or campaigns.

payments.title: Collect effortlessly
payments.description: Set up recurring billing once and forget the rest. Accept multiple payment methods and automatically reconcile with your accounting.

network.title: Your network under control
network.description: Monitor your MikroTik infrastructure from a single panel. Execute bulk actions without logging into each router.
